thread.title: Earth Alive Appoints New US Sales Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Earth Alive Appoints New US Sales Director
text:
MONTREAL, March 08, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Earth Alive Clean Technologies Inc. (CSE:EAC) (“ Earth Alive ” or the “ Corporation ”), is pleased to announce the appointment of Matt Shanks as the Director of Sales for the United States, with an initial focus on the Pacific Northwest.
Mr. Shanks has been specialising in the sale of organic inputs and biostimulants in the US, Mexico, and Chile for over 21 years. In his career he has collaborated with researchers, international governments and industry professionals to improve the availability of organic products in the marketplace.
Prior to joining Earth Alive, Mr. Shanks was the Pacific Northwest Area Manager for an international input manufacturer, where he was responsible for bringing their new products to the market. “The need for better technology in the area of soil microbiology and biofertilizers is why I chose to come to work with the team at Earth Alive,” commented Matt Shanks. “Presently, there is a push in the agriculture community for growers to increase production in an environmentally sustainable way. Earth Alive Soil Activator TM achieves this for organic and conventional growers and contributes to building their soils which is a farmer's greatest asset.”
“I am very pleased to welcome Matt to the Earth Alive team,” said Michael Warren, Chief Executive Officer. “Matt grew up on a farm and is part of the agricultural community. His extensive experience in agriculture sales and the wide network he has built over the years make him the perfect candidate to lead our growth plan in the United States.”
About Earth Alive Clean Technologies:
Earth Alive aims to be a key player in world markets of environmentally sustainable industrial solutions. The company works with the latest innovations in microbial technology to formulate and patent innovative products that can tackle the most difficult industrial challenges, once only reserved to environmentally harmful chemicals and additives. The Company is focused on environmental sustainability in the agriculture industry and dust control for the mining industry. For additional company information, please visit: www.earthalivect.com
